title: Schedule an MRI Exam
description: A radiology scheduler receives an order for an MRI and needs to schedule the exam for the patient.

tasks.description: Identify the patient and the specific MRI exam being ordered.
tasks.expected_outcome: Scheduler finds the order in the Radiology Information System (RIS).

tasks.description: Review the MRI scanner's schedule to find an open appointment slot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Scheduler finds available times for the exam.

tasks.description: Contact the patient, schedule the exam for an agreed-upon time, and provide preparation instructions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The MRI is successfully scheduled, and the patient is informed of how to prepare.
